channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: What's Your Verdict? No. 5 --- The Angry Man
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Sam Ross)
item.description: Tim thought he'd come to Alice's defense when he confronter her abusive husband. But when Harry died later in the hospital, even though not due to injuries caused by Tim's assault ... would Tim face the consequences? What do you think the law says?
